title: FS: T206 CY YOUNG Glove Shows PSA 1 SC 350 $1150 **SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: T206 CY YOUNG Glove Shows PSA 1 SC 350 $1150 **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the below pictured T206 Cy Young (glove shows) for sale. As you can see from the scans, the card is graded PSA 1, but I think could easily bump up a grade, as the only real flaw aside from the rounded corners is a very small wrinkle and paper scuff near the top left corner.  It is also well centered with very large borders all around.  Quite nice overall for the grade!

Price is $1150 (net to me) delivered via any payment you prefer.

**CARD IS SOLD**

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
Bump for a price drop.  Most recent eBay sale on a PSA 1 was 2 days ago at $1200, and that one had a pinhole, paper loss, and lots of creasing.  This one is much nicer and cheaper too!
